# Copilot Instructions

## Project Context
This is a Phenotype organization project. Follow existing code patterns and conventions.

## Guidelines
- Follow the project's existing code style and patterns
- Prefer editing existing files over creating new ones
- Do not introduce security vulnerabilities (injection, XSS, etc.)
- Keep solutions simple and focused â€” avoid over-engineering
- Do not add unnecessary comments, docstrings, or type annotations to unchanged code
- Respect .gitignore and .claudeignore exclusions
